problems.problem: Social media websites need to spend a lot of money to moderate aggressive arguments between users.
problems.solution: Use AI system that finds and removes posts that cause fights or aggression.
problems.benefitText: €[number] reimbursment of platform fees each year
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to political opinions from [affected]

problems.problem: Criminals often try to attack websites to steal users' personal information.
problems.solution: AI security system that automatically removes information that might be dangerous to share.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to political opinions for [affected]

problems.problem: Social media becomes stressful because of too many aggressive arguments.
problems.solution: AI system that finds and removes posts that cause fights or aggression.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to political opinions for [affected]

problems.problem: There is a lot of fake news on the internet that can mislead people.
problems.solution: AI system that checks if online news is true or false.
problems.benefitText: [number]% less fake news seen by people
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to news content for [affected]

problems.problem: Managing news websites costs a lot of money because moderators are needed to check content for truthfulness.
problems.solution: AI system that checks if online news is true or false.
problems.benefitText: €[number] reimbursment of platform fees each year
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to news content for [affected]

problems.problem: News stories about police operations can make it harder for police to track down criminals.
problems.solution: AI system that blocks news stories about police operations so they are not published.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to news content for [affected]

problems.problem: Courts are too busy, so people have to wait too long before their cases are heard.
problems.solution: AI system that decides which court cases are more important than others.
problems.benefitText: [number]% faster handling of important court cases
problems.costText: Around [number]% less chance to get justice

problems.problem: Handling court cases costs the government money that could be saved for taxpayers.
problems.solution: AI system that decides which court cases are more important than others.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less chance to get justice

problems.problem: Handling court cases costs the government money that could be used to hire more police officers.
problems.solution: AI system that decides which court cases are more important than others.
problems.benefitText: [number]% less crime because of more police officers
problems.costText: Around [number]% less chance to get justice in cases that usually affect [affected]

problems.problem: Municipal workers need to spend time to check applications for protests and decide if they are safe, instead of working on other, more complex matters.
problems.solution: AI system that automatically checks protest applications and suggests rules or limits.
problems.benefitText: [number]% faster and more efficient municipial services
problems.costText: Around [number]% more likely that protests will have restrictions

problems.problem: Municipal worker hours cost a lot of money to the taxpayers. One of their (relatively easy) task is to check protest notifications.
problems.solution: AI system that automatically checks protest applications and suggests rules or limits.
problems.costText: Around [number]% more likely that protests will have restrictions

problems.problem: Protests can get out of hand and cause problems for safety and public order.
problems.solution: AI system that automatically checks protest applications and suggests rules or limits.
problems.costText: Around [number]% more likely that protests will have restrictions

problems.problem: Municipality services are too slow when hiring new workers, which delays important help and services.
problems.solution: AI system that finds and ranks the best job applicants.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less chance for applicants who are connected with [affected]

problems.problem: Finding and training new government workers costs taxpayers a lot of money.
problems.solution: AI system that finds and ranks the best job applicants.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less chance for applicants who are connected with [affected]

problems.problem: Municipality workers have increasing access to personal information, so there is a risk of data theft by employees with bad intentions.
problems.solution: AI system that finds and ranks the most trustworthy job applicants.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less chance for applicants who are connected with [affected]

problems.problem: Municipal workers need to spend time to check applications for benefits and decide if they are deserved, instead of working on other, more complex matters
problems.solution: AI system that decides on benefits automatically.
problems.costText: Around [number]% more access to personal information during applications for [affected]

problems.problem: Government services need to pay many people to check if applicants are honest when they apply for benefits or services, which costs a lot of money.
problems.solution: AI system that replaces expensive checking by predicting if applicants can be trusted.
problems.costText: Around [number]% more access to personal information during applications for [affected]

problems.problem: Governments cannot control all the small crimes and risks in public places.
problems.solution: AI system that predicts if people can be trusted based on how they act in public.
problems.costText: Around [number]% more access to personal information based on public movements for [affected]
